args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Misaligned Engine Oil Plug

Ford Motor Company (Ford) is recalling certain 2024-2025 F-150, Expedition, and 2024 Lincoln Navigator vehicles equipped with 3.5L GTDI engines.  The engine may have a misaligned engine cup plug, which can result in a rapid oil leak.A rapid oil leak can result in an engine stall, increasing the risk of a crash.  In addition, an oil leak in the presence of an ignition source such as hot engine or exhaust components, can increase the risk of a fire.

Number of Units Affected: 4163.0"
